channel.title: CVE Feed for Chimpstudio -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Chimpstudio -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-24389|2024-08-03T19:28:23.807Z -- chimpstudio -- wp%20foodbakery
item.description: The WP Foodbakery WordPress plugin before 2.2, used in the FoodBakery WordPress theme before 2.2 did not properly sanitize the foodbakery_radius parameter before outputting it back in the response, leading to an unauthenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
